doc:
Dick Warlock https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dick_Warlock 0 Dick Warlock (born February 5, 1940) is an American actor, and stuntman. He is best known for playing Michael Myers in Halloween II and he was Kurt Russell's personal stunt double for over 25 years, also collaborating with such directors as Steven Spielberg and John Carpenter. He was active from 1964 until his retirement in 2002. Warlock now resides in Kingsport, Tennessee. He has two sons, Billy Warlock and Lance Warlock, and one daughter, Rhonda. He sold the screen used hockey masks used in Friday the 13th parts 3, 4 and 5 to a private collector and artist. Dick_Warlock ( born February_5_,_1940 ) is an_American_actor , and stuntman . He is_best_known for playing Michael_Myers in Halloween_II and he was Kurt_Russell 's_personal_stunt double for over_25_years , also collaborating with such_directors as Steven_Spielberg and John_Carpenter . He was active from 1964 until his_retirement in 2002 . Warlock now resides in Kingsport , Tennessee . He has two_sons , Billy_Warlock and Lance_Warlock , and one_daughter , Rhonda . He sold the_screen used hockey_masks used in Friday the_13th_parts_3_,_4_and_5 to a_private_collector_and_artist .
